Messages.Author: Marc Toussaint
Messages.Content: Dear all, attached an update on the voting points, with e10 and e11 integrated. The cut seems quite clear, and I hope that all that intended to take the exam are above 50%? Please let me know if that's not the case. Best, MT

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Exercise 10 + 11 discussed at tutorial this Friday

Messages.Author: Wolfgang Hönig
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Since exercises 10 and 11 are shorter (2 questions each), we'll discuss both jointly this Friday. There are two separate voting sheets (and in case you can't joint in person two submission sheets) on ISIS. The voting and submission sheets for exercise 10 are open again (until this Friday). For the exam prerequisite evaluation, we'll count both exercises separately. Best, Wolfgang

Messages.Author: Marc Toussaint
Messages.Content: Dear all, I need to go to the doctor (hit my foot badly). I need to cancel the tutorial. (Please still fill in the voting sheet.) We'll discuss Tuesday how to catch up with this. Best, Marc

Messages.Author: Wolfgang Hönig
Messages.Content: Dear Students, We would be grateful if you could provide feedback for the class. The official TUB evaluation is available at https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?p=KS2GG  It should only take 5-10 min and the deadline is this Friday.  Evaluations are crucial for us to improve the course and our lecture style in the future. Thanks, Wolfgang

Messages.Author: Marc Toussaint
Messages.Content: Dear all, I uploaded the new exercise sheet last night - there is no coding part this time. I created the exam registration on Moses (two separate ones, for Ersttermin and Zweittermin). Please register. We'll try to compute a first estimate of your exercise voting points by Friday. Best, Marc

Messages.Author: Cornelius Valentin Braun
Messages.Content: Dear all, An updated version of exercise 7 is online now. The new version now features part 3, the coding exercise and some supplementary code to help you. You do not need to use this code, but it may help you to implement the pink noise class and the plotting. Best, Cornelius

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Follow up on tutorial to exercise sheet 5
